Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

HDIGDRIVER

The basic type HDIGDRIVER is a handle to an digital audio device.

Discussion

HDIGDRIVER handles are returned from the AIL_open_digital_driver function.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services, 3D Digital Audio Services, Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_open, AIL_active_sample_count, AIL_allocate_file_sample, AIL_allocate_sample_handle, AIL_close_digital_driver, AIL_create_wave_synthesizer, AIL_digital_CPU_percent, AIL_digital_configuration, AIL_digital_handle_reacquire, AIL_digital_handle_release, AIL_digital_latency, AIL_digital_master_reverb, AIL_digital_master_reverb_levels, AIL_digital_master_volume_level, AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_install_DIG_INI, AIL_install_DIG_driver_file, AIL_install_DIG_driver_image, AIL_minimum_sample_buffer_size, AIL_open_3D_provider, AIL_open_digital_driver, AIL_open_filter, AIL_open_stream, AIL_quick_handles, AIL_set_DirectSound_HWND, AIL_set_digital_driver_processor, AIL_set_digital_master_reverb, AIL_set_digital_master_reverb_levels, AIL_set_digital_master_room_type, AIL_set_digital_master_volume_level, AIL_waveOutOpen
Related FAQs: How do I open a 3D digital provider?
